snippet: The bride is an instructor of clinical medicine at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine and an attending physician at Montefiore Medical Center, both in the Bronx; the groom is a business lecturer at Rutgers, where he is also studying for a dual...
lead_paragraph: The bride is an instructor of clinical medicine at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine and an attending physician at Montefiore Medical Center, both in the Bronx; the groom is a business lecturer at Rutgers, where he is also studying for a dual Ph.D. in organizational management and sociology.
